cards.prompt: Hold each other close, breathe together, and confess how it feels when you are kept hovering right at the edge.
Stare into each other’s eyes and describe, in slow detail, the last time they made you tremble from being held just shy of release.
Take turns whispering exactly how you want to be teased, stopping every time your voice catches from how close you imagine getting.
With your lips almost touching, promise each other that tonight’s finish will be the deepest one yet—and agree you’ll drag out the build as long as you can.
Tell your partner three ways they drive you wild when they pull back just when you are about to lose control, then thank them for it.
Whisper what your body feels like right now on a scale from calm to desperate, and let them decide how close to desperate you are allowed to get.
Use only your mouth and breath to bring them slowly higher, pulling away every time their hips start to chase you.
Blindfold them and explore their most sensitive spots with tongue and lips, stopping the instant they tense toward climax and waiting until they calm.
Keep them on their back while you kiss lower and lower, hovering maddeningly close before sliding away to a different hot spot.
Let your fingers and tongue circle everywhere they ache for more, but never stay in one place long enough to push them over.
Press your bodies together and grind slowly, breaking contact every time either of you feels that unbearable, almost-there swell.
Circle, stroke, and kiss everywhere that makes their breathing stutter, then go still and make them ask you softly to start again.
Use your tongue to slowly trace up and down their inner thighs and lower belly, backing away each time their muscles tighten for more.
Let your hand or lips bring them to a deep, shaking edge three times in a row before you even think about letting them finish.
You are in control: use mouth and hands to bring your partner right to the brink, then command them to breathe and hold while you stop.
Your partner may not finish until you give permission; tease them with slow strokes, pauses, and firm eye contact while they beg sweetly.
Switch roles every few minutes: one builds the other to an almost unbearable high, then pulls back and makes them wait.
Let them guide your hand and mouth exactly how they like, but you choose when to suddenly slow, stop, or change rhythm.
Tell your partner they must stay still while you work them closer and closer; if they move, you pull away and start the climb again.
Give your partner a countdown: you will touch intensely for 20 seconds, then stop—repeat this rise-and-fall cycle as many times as you can.
One of you is allowed to enjoy; the other is denied. Trade places halfway so you both feel the sweet frustration.
Agree on a secret word that means “too close”; the teasing partner must stop instantly when it’s said and make the other cool down before starting again.
Use a cool object then your warm mouth, alternating sensations until your partner is shaking with the need to finally let go.
Describe in explicit, breathy detail how you want to drag them to the edge again and again before you finally allow that explosion.
Have them lie back and keep their hands above their head while you explore, deciding exactly how many times you will deny their finish tonight.
Take turns giving each other a slow, filthy whisper in the ear of what you will do once they are finally allowed to go all the way.
Set a timer; you both must stay at a desperate, almost-finish level until it rings, using touch and words to keep each other right there.
Playfully forbid your partner to finish tonight, but work them up so high that you both know tomorrow’s release will be feral.
After edging each other until you both ache, agree together that the next time you push, no one holds back.
Climb to the edge one last time, staying locked in eye contact, and only let go when you both say yes in unison.
Choose which of you is allowed to finish first, and make the other watch and feel every second before claiming their own release.
Finish in whatever way feels most intense, then keep holding and touching softly so the aftershocks stretch on together.
Lie tangled together and talk about the hottest moment of the teasing tonight, replaying it slowly while you drift down.
Promise each other that next time you will stretch the build even further, then seal it with one last lazy, satisfied kiss.
